    • Method Detail

      • colName

        public ColumnReferenceByName colName(String colName)
        Description copied from interface: ColumnsFactory

        Creates column reference, which references column by name, without table name.

        Calling this method is equivalent in calling ColumnsFactory.colName(String, String) and passing null as first argument.

        Specified by:
        colName in interface ColumnsFactory
        Parameters:
        colName - The name of the column.
        Returns:
        The new ColumnReferenceByName.
